name: com.huynguyen03dev.ide.kiro
description: Amazon Kiro IDE integration for Unity. Provides seamless integration with Kiro's agentic development environment, including support for generating csproj files for IntelliSense, auto-discovery of Kiro installations, and enhanced debugging capabilities.

_upm.changelog:
Integration:

- Add support for Amazon Kiro IDE
- Migrated from Cursor IDE to Kiro IDE integration
- Enhanced agentic development workflow support
